column4: hello guys! i'm with Ubuntu 8.10. do you think if i try to update it many things will broke? i want to update, becase have many things to configure if i choose to install a fresh new ubuntu. can i go only with the updates?
You can copy the config files for most of the apps and your theme/appearance settings. There are hidden directories which keep keep such files in Home directory. Check it!
However, one can't be sure of whether those apps would be compatible with latest Ubuntu. But, you may still give a try. But yes, go for clean installation
Well on a speedy system...arnd 15-20 mins or so.
